response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-withdrawnMarke: You have been withdrawn from marking this question group. This will not prevent you from marking other question groups where you have a quota.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-maximumConcurr: You have already requested the maximum concurrent number of responses for your current marking target.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-noResponseAvai: There are currently no responses available to download for marking. Please check again later.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-suspendedMarke: There are currently no responses available to download for marking. Please check again later.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-concurrentLimi: {0} response(s) have been downloaded. It is not possible to download further responses to mark as there are no more responses available.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-markingLimitRe: Only {0} response(s) have been downloaded as the number of  responses in your worklist has reached the number of responses required to meet your marking target.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-maximumAllocat: No responses have been downloaded as the number of  responses in your worklist has reached the number of responses required to meet your marking target.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-sessionClosed: It is not possible to download responses to mark as the session has been closed.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-aggregate-mark: Only {0} response(s) have been downloaded as the number of  responses in your worklist has reached the number required to meet your aggregated marking target for all versions of this paper.
response-allocation-error-dialog.response-allocation-error-maximumAggrega: No responses have been downloaded as the number of  responses in your worklist has reached the number of responses required to meet your aggregated marking target for all versions of this paper.
You have already requested the maximum concurrent number of responses for your current marking target.

approval-status-changed-dialog.body: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until your supervisor provides you with feedback. You can still review any responses which have already been downloaded into your worklist. This will not prevent you from marking other question groups where you have a quota.
approval-status-changed-dialog.body-relatedQIG: Not all responses have been submitted because you have not yet been approved for marking
approval-status-changed-dialog.body-quality-feedback: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until you have accepted feedback on this seed, and your supervisor has provided you with further feedback about your marking. This will not prevent you from marking other question groups where you have a quota.
approval-status-changed-dialog.body-withdrawn: You cannot submit responses because you have been withdrawn from the marking team for this question group.

response-data.amd-tooltip: The total difference between the marks you awarded and the definitive marks set by the senior examiner team, calculated across each individual question item
response-data.tmd-tooltip: The difference between the overall total mark you awarded, and the overall total mark set by the senior examiner team
response-data.additional-objects-not-annotated-icon-to: Response has additional answer pages that must be annotated before marks can be submitted
response-data.exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.zoning-exceptions-icon-tooltip: The zoning of this candidate's script is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. You will be unable to submit this response until this exception is resolved.
response-data.blocking-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. You will not be able to submit the response until these exceptions have been resolved and closed. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting for you to review and close. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-and-blocking-exceptions-icon-to: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting for you to review and close. You will not be able to submit the response until you have closed these exceptions. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked messages. Click this icon to view the messages.
response-data.unread-messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more unread linked messages. Click this icon to view the messages.
response-data.not-all-files-viewed-icon-tooltip: Not all files have been viewed in this response
response-data.mark-change-reason-not-specified-icon-to: This response cannot be submitted until you explain why you have changed the marks
response-data.supervisor-remark-decision-not-specified: This response cannot be submitted until the candidate's final mark, and the reason, is selected

auto-approved-dialog.summary-stm-standardisation: Your STM standardisation marking is completed.
auto-approved-dialog.body-standardisation: The accuracy of your marking is within the defined tolerance and you have been automatically approved to start live marking. You can look at your submitted standardisation and practice responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.
auto-approved-dialog.body-excess-standardisation-responses-re: The accuracy of your marking is within the defined tolerance and you have been automatically approved to start live marking. Your standardisation marking is now complete and the remaining open standardisation responses in your worklist have been removed. You can look at your submitted standardisation responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.
auto-approved-dialog.body-stm-standardisation: The accuracy of your marking is within the defined tolerance and you have been automatically approved to start live marking. You can refer back to your submitted standardisation and practice responses at any time by clicking on the required response type on the side of the work list screen
auto-approved-dialog.body-excess-second-standardisation-respo: The accuracy of your marking is within the defined tolerance and you have been automatically approved to start live marking. Your 2nd standardisation marking is now complete and the remaining open 2nd standardisation responses in your worklist have been removed. You can look at your submitted 2nd standardisation responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.
auto-approved-dialog.body-excess-stm-standardisation-response: The accuracy of your marking is within the defined tolerance and you have been automatically approved to start live marking. Your STM standardisation marking is now complete and the remaining open STM standardisation responses in your worklist have been removed. You can look at your submitted STM standardisation responses at any time by selecting the relevant worklist.

atypical.search-button-tooltip: Search for an atypical response to mark
atypical.centre-search-tooltip: Please enter a centre number to search for
atypical.candidate-search-tooltip: Please enter a candidate number to search for

atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-disabled: You are not in an approved state for all the QIGs that make up this paper and is no longer allowed to perform this action.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-0: No expected candidate for this paper matches the details entered. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-10: No expected candidate for this paper matches the details entered. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-4: No expected candidate for this paper matches the details entered. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-5: The response associated with this candidate is not atypical. Please check the centre and candidate numbers and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-6: You are not eligible to mark papers from this centre. Please check the centre number and try again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-7: This response was previously removed from your worklist by your awarding body, so it cannot be allocated to you again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-2: This response is already in your worklist
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-3: This response is already in your worklist
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-8: This response has already been allocated to another examiner.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-9: You previously rejected this response, so it cannot be allocated to you again.
atypical-search-error-dialog.atypical-search-error-1: The response for centre {0}, candidate {1} belongs to {2}. Please confirm whether you would like to mark it now, move it to your worklist to mark later, or cancel and don't download it.

action-buttons.allocate-button-not-approved-tooltip: You cannot get new responses until you have received feedback on your marking from your supervisor.
action-buttons.submit-button-not-approved-tooltip: You cannot submit responses until you have received feedback on your marking from your supervisor.
action-buttons.allocate-button-tooltip: Select number of responses to download

no-responses-available-helper.body: There are currently no responses available to download for marking. Please check again later.

marking-target-complete-helper.body: You have completed your marking target for this question group and cannot download any more responses. You can continue to mark any outstanding re-mark responses and other question groups where you have a quota.
marking-target-complete-helper.aggregate-body: You have completed your aggregated marking target for all versions of this paper and cannot download any more responses. You can continue to mark any outstanding re-mark responses and other question groups where you have a quota.

empty-worklist-helper.body-line-1: Your worklist is empty. Before you can start marking you need to download some responses.
empty-worklist-helper.body-line-2: Clicking the 'Get new responses' button will download responses to fill up your worklist to your limit of {0} open responses.
empty-worklist-helper.body-line-3: Note that if you have open re-marks that do not have a quota these will also count towards your open response limit and may prevent you from downloading more live responses.
empty-worklist-helper.aggregated-body-line-2: Clicking the 'New response' button will download responses to your aggregated limit of {0} open responses for all versions of this paper.

submit-response-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to submit this response?
submit-response-dialog.body-simulation: Are you sure  you want to submit this response? The response marks shall not be saved or visible after submission.

submit-all-responses-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to submit all fully marked responses?
submit-all-responses-dialog.body-simulation: Are you sure you want to submit all marked responses? The response marks shall not be saved or visible after submission.

response-submission-error-dialog.body-single-response-not-submitted: This response could not be submitted. Please review your worklist and try again.
response-submission-error-dialog.body-some-responses-not-submitted: Some responses could not be submitted. Please review your worklist and try again.
response-submission-error-dialog.body-single-response-already-submitted: This response could not be submitted because it has already been submitted previously.
response-submission-error-dialog.body-some-responses-already-submitted: One or more responses could not be submitted because they have already been submitted previously.

not-approved-helper.body-line-1: Your standardisation marking has been sent to your supervisor for review.
not-approved-helper.body-line-2: You will not be able to continue marking this question group until your supervisor has provided you with feedback. The status will update automatically when the review is complete. This will not prevent you from marking other question groups where you have a quota.

quality-feedback-dialog.body: You have submitted one or more seeds within tolerance of the definitive marks given by the senior examiner team. Should you wish to review your marking against the definitive marks, you can do so in the Submitted - Closed worklist.

request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-approval-status-changed: Your status has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-withdrawn: You have been withdrawn from this question group. This will not prevent you from accessing other question groups where you have a quota.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-hierarchy-changed: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-no-examiners-available: A marking check cannot be requested because there is no one in the marking hierarchy with the correct permissions to perform a check.
request-marking-check-error-dialog.body-session-closed: This action cannot be completed as the component is now closed for marking. Please choose another component to work on.

request-marking-check-menu.header: Please select the examiner(s) who you want to check your marks.

perform-marking-check.perform-marking-check-body-1: You have been asked to check the marks of one or more examiners. Select
perform-marking-check.perform-marking-check-body-2: to view and perform a marking check.

perform-marking-check-confirmation-dialo.body: Are you sure that you want to set the marking of {0} as checked? You will no longer be able to access their worklist.

list-view-column-headers.time-to-end-of-grace-period: Time to end of grace period

simulation-helper.body-line-1: Your worklist is empty. Before you can start marking you need to download some responses. Any marking you enter in simulation mode will not be returned as live marks. When the simulation marking period ends, your simulation marking will be deleted automatically and you will not be able to refer back to it.
simulation-helper.body-line-2: Clicking the 'Get new response' button will download a simulation response into your worklist for you to mark.

worklist.submitted-editable-worklist-helper: You can edit the marks of the responses in this list until the end of grace period. Any changes you make will be automatically saved. When the grace period  for a response ends, it will automatically move to the closed list and marks will be returned to your awarding body.

quality-feedback-helper.quality-feedback-outstanding: You have submitted a seed that is out of tolerance with the definitive marks given by the senior examiner team. Please open the response to review the feedback on your seed and then use the 'Accept feedback' button within the response to acknowledge you have accepted the feedback. When you have done this you will be able to continue marking.
quality-feedback-helper.quality-feedback-outstanding-and-suspend: You have submitted a seed that is out of tolerance with the definitive marks given by the senior examiner team. Please open the response to review the feedback on your seed and then use the 'Accept feedback' button within the response to acknowledge you have accepted the feedback. When you have done this you will be able to continue marking, but you will not be able to download or submit responses until your supervisor has provided you with further feedback about your marking.

exited-simulation-dialog.subheader-multiple-qigs: Standardisation setup is now complete for the following QIG(s):
exited-simulation-dialog.subheader-single-qig: Standardisation setup is now complete for the following QIG:
exited-simulation-dialog.body-multiple-qigs: You are now able to start Marking. Simulation mode will no longer be available for the above QIG(s).
exited-simulation-dialog.body-single-qig: You are now able to start Marking. Simulation mode will no longer be available for the above QIG.

autozoned-warning-dialog.body: Responses in this question group have been automatically zoned. Please raise an exception if you see any content belonging to a question which cannot be marked.

complex-optionality.total-marks: This paper has a complex rubric. The total mark for this response will only be calculated once you have entered a mark for all question items and saved your changes by navigating away from it.

saving-marks-error-dialog.body-error-saving-marks-single-response: The marks and annotations you previously applied to this response could not be saved. Please review it and apply any missing marks and annotations again.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-error-saving-def-marks-single-respo: The definitive marks and annotations you previously applied to this response could not be saved. They may have been modified by another member of the standardisation team.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-error-saving-marks-multiple-respons: Marks and annotations could not be saved for the following response(s). Please review and apply any missing marks and annotations again.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-error-saving-def-marks-multiple-res: Definitive marks and annotations could not be saved for the following response(s). They may have been modified by another member of the standardisation team.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-cannot-leave-response-partially-mar: As you have already submitted this response, you may not leave any question items unmarked. Please ensure that you have entered a mark for every question item before leaving the response.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-response-removed-from-worklist: Response {0} has now been removed from your worklist and the changes cannot be saved.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-must-annotate-all-pages-in-grace: As you have already submitted this response, you cannot leave it and save your changes until you either place at least one annotation on every page, or use the 'Mark as seen' button in full response view to confirm that you have viewed the content of each page.
saving-marks-error-dialog.body-grace-period-expired-changes-not-sa: The adjustments you made to the marks and annotations of response {0} were not saved because the grace period has expired. This response has now been moved to your Submitted - closed worklist.

complete-button-dialog.body: This will enter a mark of NR for all unmarked question items. Do you wish to continue?

supervisor-remark-decision.originalmarks: Original marks: Original marks as final marks
supervisor-remark-decision.popout-body: Please select which set of marks you want to assign as the final marks, and reason.

previous-marks.people-icon: Choose which marks and annotations to show

on-page-comment-box.side-view-icon-tooltip: View comments at the side of the script

left-toolbar.no-note-text1-in-placeholder: Click here to add a note.
left-toolbar.no-note-text2-in-placeholder: This will be visible during standardisation setup only. It is not part of the definitive comments or annotations.

zoom-rotate-panel.zoom-fit-height-tooltip: Zoom all images to fit the height of the script display area
zoom-rotate-panel.zoom-fit-width-tooltip: Zoom all images to fit the width of the script display area

mark-scheme-panel.reset-mark-button-tooltip: Reset mark and annotations for this question item
mark-scheme-panel.total-marks-cbt: This paper has a complex rubric. The total mark for this response will only be calculated once you have entered a mark for all question items and saved your changes by navigating away from it.
mark-scheme-panel.optionality-tooltip: This response contains optional questions. A line will be shown for all question items that will not be included in the total mark according to the defined rubric.
mark-scheme-panel.complete-button-tooltip-when-enabled: Enter a mark of NR for all unmarked question items
mark-scheme-panel.complete-button-tooltip-when-disabled: You can only use this button once you have manually entered marks against enough question items to satisfy the rubric for this question paper
mark-scheme-panel.unzoned-indicator-tooltip: No content has been assigned to this question item
mark-scheme-panel.link-indicator-tooltip: Page(s) have been linked to this question item

invalid-mark-dialog.body-numeric: Please enter a mark between {0} and {1}

mba-max-mark-exceeded-dialog.body: Adding this annotation would cause the maximum mark of {0} for this question item to be exceeded. The annotation has not been applied.

reset-mark-dialog.body-when-mark-deleted: You have reset the marks originally awarded, do you want to remove the annotations and comments as well?
reset-mark-dialog.body-when-reset-button-clicked: This will reset the mark and remove all annotations and comments for the associated question item. Are you sure you want to do this?
reset-mark-dialog.body-when-reset-button-clicked-cbt: This will reset the marks. Are you sure you want to do this?

share-confirmation-popup.content: Are you sure you want to stop sharing this overlay with all examiners?

end-of-list-dialog.body: You have reached the last response in your worklist. Would you like to go back to your worklist?

delete-comment-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

annotation-toolbar-helper.body-before-adding-stamp-with-overlays: Note that you cannot drag the overlay tools here.
annotation-toolbar-helper.body-before-adding-stamp: Drag the annotations you use regularly into this panel. These annotations will then be visible at all times without having to expand the full toolbar. You must drag at least one annotation into the toolbar to continue marking.
annotation-toolbar-helper.body-after-adding-stamp: When you have finished adding annotations to your favourites toolbar, use this button to collapse the full list of annotations and start marking. You can expand the toolbar again by selecting this button.

accept-quality-feedback-dialog.body: Please confirm that you have reviewed and accepted the feedback provided for this response.

discard-message-or-exception-dialog.body: Opening another message will discard changes to any new messages or exceptions that are unsaved. Are you sure you want to lose your unsaved changes?

raise-exception-panel.exception-type-label: I am raising an exception for the following reason:
raise-exception-panel.open-exception-exists-against-response: There is already an open exception of this type against this response
raise-exception-panel.open-exception-exists-against-question: There is already an open exception of this type against this question
raise-exception-panel.blocking-exception-description: Raising this exception will prevent you from submitting this response and only once the exception has been resolved and closed by you it will be possible to submit the response.
raise-exception-panel.non-blocking-exception-description: Raising this exception will not prevent you from submitting this response.
raise-exception-panel.incorrect-component-or-paper-additional-: Please note that if the response is moved to correct component it will no longer appear in your list of responses to mark.
raise-exception-panel.file-cannot-be-accessed-or-read-addition: Please note that if this file is removed in order for another one to be uploaded in its place, it is likely that you will not receive this same response again for marking and any marking would unfortunately be lost.
raise-exception-panel.new-exception-subtitle-has-unmanagedslao: I am unable to mark this response due to the following reason:

exception-list-panel.open-blocking-exception-tooltip: You will not be able to submit the response until the exception has been resolved and closed
exception-list-panel.exception-blocker-resolved: You will not be able to submit the response until you have closed the exception

reject-rig-confirmation-dialog.body: Rejecting this response will put it back into the pool for someone else to mark; you will not be able to download it again. You should only do this if you believe you know the candidate, or your awarding body has advised you of other cases where you should reject a response. Are you sure you want to continue?

discard-exception-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to discard this exception without submitting?
discard-exception-dialog.body-navigate-away: Are you sure you want to navigate from this page as the exception is unsaved and will be discarded?
discard-exception-dialog.body-raise-new: Are you sure you want to discard your existing unsubmitted exception?
discard-exception-dialog.body-open-another: Opening another exception will discard changes to any new messages or exceptions that are unsaved. Are you sure you want to lose your unsaved changes?

close-exception-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to close this exception?

exception-escalation-points.4: This exception will be escalated to RM Service desk.
exception-escalation-points.3: This exception will be escalated to the Assessment Operations Officer for the subject you are marking.
exception-escalation-points.2: This exception will be raised to your Supervisor.

eur-marks-change-popout.body: Please explain why you have changed the marks for this response

leaving-response-warning-dialog.body: Please review the following before leaving this response:

submit-response-warning-dialog.body: Please review the following before submitting this response:

share-response-warning-dialog.body: Please review the following before sharing this response:

leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-pages-annotated: Not all pages are annotated. You will be unable to submit the response until you either place at least one annotation on every page, or use the 'Mark as seen' button in full response view to confirm that you have viewed the content of each page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-pages-annotated-in-grace: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you either place at least one annotation on every page, or use the 'Mark as seen' button in full response view to confirm that you have viewed the content of each page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.eur-mark-change-reason-not-applied: You will be unable to submit the response until you explain why you have changed the marks.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.eur-mark-change-reason-not-applied-in-gr: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you explain why you have changed the marks.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.message-will-be-discarded: The message you are currently writing will be discarded.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.exception-will-be-discarded: The exception you are currently raising will be discarded.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-slaos-annotated: Not all additional pages are annotated. You will be unable to submit the response until you place at least one annotation on every additional page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-slaos-annotated-in-grace: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you place at least one annotation on every additional page.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.all-questions-marked-nr: All question items in this response have been assigned a No response (NR) mark which implies that the candidate has not attempted any of the questions.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.supervisor-remark-decision-not-applied: You will be unable to submit the response until you select a set of marks to use as the candidate's final mark.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.supervisor-remark-decision-not-applied-i: You cannot leave this response and save your changes until you select a set of marks to use as the candidate's final mark.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.questions-marked-nr: 'No response (NR)' has been assigned to one or more items included in the total mark. This implies that the candidate has not followed the rubric.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.questions-marked-nr-used-in-total: A No response (NR) mark has been assigned to one or more mandatory question items. This implies that the candidate has not attempted these questions.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.questions-marked-not-used-in-total: Marks have been assigned to one or more items that are not included in the total mark. This implies that the candidate has not followed the rubric.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.enhanced-off-page-comment-will-be-discar: Changes you have made to the selected comment will be discarded.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.not-all-files-viewed: Not all files associated with the current response have been viewed. You will be unable to submit the response until you have viewed all the files.
leaving-or-submitting-response-warnings.file-downloaded-outside: Please ensure that you have closed any files you have downloaded and opened outside of Assessor for this response.

media-player.file-to-play-icon-tooltip: Select version of file to play
media-player.download-transcoded-icon-tooltip: Download transcoded version of this file
media-player.browser-not-supported-error: Your browser is not able to play the audio/video file. Please make sure you are using a supported device and browser

media-player-error-dialog.body-audio-network-error: There was a problem with the connection when trying to load the audio file. Please try selecting the file again.
media-player-error-dialog.body-audio-generic-error: There was a problem loading the audio file. Please try selecting the file again. If the issue persists, please try
media-player-error-dialog.body-video-network-error: There was a problem with the connection when trying to load the video file. Please try selecting the file again.
media-player-error-dialog.body-video-generic-error: There was a problem loading the video file. Please try selecting the file again. If the issue persists, please try
media-player-error-dialog.quick-link-play-alternate: You can also try playing the

delete-enhanced-off-page-comment-confirm.body: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

discard-enhanced-off-page-comment-confir.body: Are you sure you want to discard the changes you have made to this comment?

discard-new-enhanced-off-page-comment-co.body: Are you sure you want to discard this comment?

discard-enhanced-off-page-comment-other-.body: If you select a different set of comments, the comment you are currently editing will be discarded. Are you sure you want to continue?

ecoursework-unsupported-file-placeholder.line-1: This file cannot be viewed within RM Assessor
ecoursework-unsupported-file-placeholder.line-2: It can be downloaded and opened on your computer.

ebookmarking.unzoned-images-placeholder: No content has been assigned to this question item.

zoning-warning-dialog.body: The zoning of this candidate's script is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. It is suggested that you select other responses to mark until this exception is resolved.

script-page.suppressed-page-tooltip: You are not allowed to view this page; it is not part of the candidate's response and it may contain information that identifies them

full-response-view.all-pages-annotated-text-full-response: All pages of this response have been annotated
full-response-view.all-pages-annotated-text-no-pages-to-dis: There are no unannotated pages to display
full-response-view.all-additional-pages-annotated-text-full: All additional pages of this response have been annotated
full-response-view.all-additional-pages-annotated-text-no-p: There are no unannotated additional pages to display

page-linking-popup.header: Please choose question item(s) to link this page to

unlink-annotations-exist-dialog.body: You may not unlink the following question item(s) because there are annotations related to them on this page. Please remove the annotations before unlinking.

manage-slaos-dialog.body: This candidate's response contains additional pages that are not part of the main answer booklet. Please review these pages carefully. Once you have either linked each page to one or more question items, or flagged it as "Seen", you will be able to start marking the response.

slaos-managed-dialog.body: All additional pages have been linked to a question item or flagged as "Seen". Would you like to start marking this response now?

slao-link-removal-dialog.body: By removing all links from this page you are confirming that this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

unknown-content-link-removal-dialog.body: By removing all links from this page you are confirming that this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

manage-slaos-remark-dialog.body: This candidate's response contains additional pages that are not part of the main answer booklet. The original examiner has already reviewed these and either linked them to question item(s) or flagged them as "Seen". Please review these pages and links carefully, and make adjustments if required, before you start reviewing and adjusting the original marks.

flag-as-seen-dialog.body: By selecting "OK" you are confirming that this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

ebookmarking-flag-as-seen-dialog.body: By selecting "OK" you are confirming that the unassigned content on this page does not contain anything that would count towards the candidate's mark for this response. If this is correct please select "OK". Otherwise please select "Cancel" and then link it to the question item(s) it relates to.

unknown-content-dialog.body: This candidate's response contains pages or parts of pages that have not been assigned to a question item. Please review these pages carefully to validate whether they apply to any question(s) for which you will be submitting marks. Once you have either linked each page to one or more question items, or flagged it as "Seen", you will be able to start marking the response.

unknown-content-managed-dialog.body: All pages with unknown content have been linked to a question item or flagged as "Seen". Would you like to start marking this response now?

unknown-content-dialog-in-remark.body: This candidate's response contains pages or parts of pages that have not been assigned to a question item. The original examiner has already reviewed these and either linked them to question item(s) or flagged them as "Seen". Please review these pages and links carefully, and make adjustments if required, before you start reviewing and adjusting the original marks.

busy-indicator.savingMarksAndAnnotations: Saving marks and annotations. Please wait...
busy-indicator.savingMarksAndAnnotations-offline: Assessor 3 is attempting to save your work, but you are currently offline. Please check your Internet connection. Once a connection is established your work will automatically be saved. Please don't close your browser or you will lose any unsaved changes.

offline-dialog.body: This action cannot be completed because RM Assessor{0} cannot communicate with the server. Please check your Internet connection and try again. To avoid losing work, please don't log out or close your browser until you are back online.
offline-dialog.body-user-options-changed: Assessor 3 cannot communicate with the server to save your preferences and log out. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
offline-dialog.body-application-files-not-downloaded: This action cannot be completed because RM Assessor{0} cannot communicate with the server. Please check your Internet connection. Once you are back online you will be automatically taken to the area you were trying to access. To avoid losing work, please dont close your browser.

approval-statuses.status-changed: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until your supervisor provides you with feedback. You can still review any responses which have already been downloaded into your worklist. This will not prevent you from marking other question groups where you have a quota.
approval-statuses.status-changed-qualityfeedback: Your approval status on this question group has changed and you cannot download or submit responses until you have accepted feedback on this seed, and your supervisor has provided you with further feedback about your marking. This will not prevent you from marking other question groups where you have a quota.

accuracy-indicators.accurate-tooltip: Your marks for this response exactly match the definitive marks
accuracy-indicators.inaccurate-tooltip: Your marks for this response do not exactly match the definitive marks, and are outside of the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.in-tolerance-tooltip: Your marks for this response do not exactly match the definitive marks, but are within the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.accurate-tooltip-team-management: The marks for this response exactly match the definitive marks
accuracy-indicators.inaccurate-tooltip-team-management: The marks for this response do not exactly match the definitive marks, and are outside of the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.in-tolerance-tooltip-team-management: The marks for this response do not exactly match the definitive marks, but are within the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.original-mark-accurate-tooltip: Your marks for this response exactly match the original marks
accuracy-indicators.original-mark-inaccurate-tooltip: Your marks for this response do not exactly match the original marks, and are outside of the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.original-mark-in-tolerance-tooltip: Your marks for this response do not exactly match the original marks, but are within the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.original-mark-accurate-tooltip-team-mana: The marks for this response exactly match the original marks
accuracy-indicators.original-mark-inaccurate-tooltip-team-ma: The marks for this response do not exactly match the original marks, and are outside of the acceptable tolerance
accuracy-indicators.original-mark-in-tolerance-tooltip-team-: The marks for this response do not exactly match the original marks, but are within the acceptable tolerance

1.name: Colour Image Request
1.details: I am unable to mark the candidate's response because the image is unclear.  I would like to request a colour version of this image as I believe this will make it clearer.  I do not need the whole script to be scanned again.  Examples include use of pale coloured writing implements or a graphical response that is difficult to read.  Please note that a colour image request may take up to 24 hours to be delivered and may take longer to download and mark due to the increased image processing required.

2.name: Image Rescan Request
2.details: I am unable to mark this candidate's response because the image is of poor quality.  Examples may be scan lines, folded paper or image skew.

3.name: Suspected Malpractice
3.details: I suspect malpractice in relation to this candidate's response.  I would like this to be reviewed.

4.name: Offensive Content
4.details: The candidate's response is offensive or obscene.  I would like to make the awarding body aware of this.

5.name: Material of Concern
5.details: The candidate's response gives me concern about the candidate's well-being.  I would like to make the awarding body aware of this.

6.name: Incorrect Question Paper
6.details: I cannot mark this item because the image does not correspond to the question paper I am marking.

7.name: Undecipherable
7.details: I am unable to mark the candidate's response because the response is undecipherable.  A further rescan will not improve the situation because the problem is with the writing and not the image.  Examples include poor handwriting or overwriting the original response.

8.name: Answer outside of Guidance
8.details: Unable to mark because the mark scheme instructions do not cover this candidate's response.

9.name: Misclassified
9.details: Unable to mark because I suspect that part of the response belongs to a different candidate or has been otherwise misclassified.

10.name: Concatenated Script Exception
10.details: This candidate response contains scripts for two or more candidates.

11.name: Script Contains Coversheet Only
11.details: This candidate response contains only the coversheet.

12.name: Incorrect Component or Paper
12.details: I cannot mark this question paper because the candidate's response does not correspond to the component or paper I am marking.

13.name: Non-Script Object
13.details: This script contains one or more objects that I believe to be non-script objects.

14.name: Image cannot be accessed or read
14.details: I am unable to mark this response because one or more images cannot be accessed or read. (Re-conversion of file will cause all current marks to be lost)

15.name: Candidate Welfare Concern
15.details: I have concerns about this candidate's response. I would like this to be investigated.

16.name: Malpractice Concern
16.details: I suspect malpractice in relation to this candidate's response. I would like this to be reviewed.

17.name: PA Referral
17.details: I have a problem marking this response, which cannot be resolved with my Supervisor's help.

18.name: Zoning Error Missing Content
18.details: The zone for this question does not capture all the candidate response relating to the question.

19.name: Zoning Error Other Content
19.details: The zone for this question contains response content relating to another question within this script.

20.name: Mark Scheme Query
20.details: Unable to zone because the mark scheme does not appear to match this candidate's responses.

21.name: Supervisory Concerns other than Hours Spent
21.details: This exception is to alert the IB to supervisory concerns including the omission of a supervisor comment, or concerning information contained within the comment. This can also be used to communicate any other supervisory concern to the IB, provided details are given.

22.name: Violation of a Policy
22.details: This exception is to alert the IB to the violation of a policy, such as the animal experimentation policy. Please provide specific details.

23.name: Violation of Ethical or Subject-Specific Guidelines
23.details: This exception is to alert the IB to the violation of ethical guidelines, or subject-specific guidelines as outlined in the associated subject. Please provide specific details.

24.name: Incorrect file
24.details: this type of exception should be raised if the response being marked contains a file that is not correctly associated with a particular Question Item. This exception will be escalated to the Awarding Body Administrators. It will only be possible to submit a response which has had this type of exception raised against it when the exception has been resolved and you have closed the exception.

25.name: File access error
25.details: This type of exception should be raised if the response being marked contains a file that does not open correctly. This exception will be escalated to the Awarding Body Administrators. It will only be possible to submit a response which has had this type of exception raised against it when the exception has been resolved and you have closed the exception.

26.name: Incorrect Image
26.details: This type of exception should be raised if the response being marked contains a file that is not correctly associated with a particular Question Item Group. This exception will be escalated to the Awarding Body Administrators. It will only be possible to submit a response which has had this type of exception raised against it when the exception has been resolved and you have closed the exception.

27.name: Incomplete coursework
27.details: Raised when an examiner believes that the candidate has submitted incomplete coursework.

28.name: Work not following course requirements
28.details: Raised when an examiner believes that the candidate has followed the wrong level or possibly last years (or next years) requirements

30.name: Missing Letter for External Institute
30.details: This exception is to alert the IB when the letter for external institute is missing

31.name: Issue accessing file
31.details: I am experiencing problems accessing a file related to this response and require Awarding Body assistance to resolve this and to allow me to carry on marking.

32.name: Missing and/or Incorrect File
32.details: I believe one or more files related to this candidate response is incorrect, or are missing, preventing me from completing marking.

33.name: Word count exceeded
33.details: The candidates evidence has exceeded the stipulated word count  by more than 10%

34.name: Additional material - Missing
34.details: The candidate has not submitted the required Resource, Research Evidence or Processed Information Sheet(s).

35.name: Additional material  Word/page count exceeded
35.details: The candidate has exceeded the word/page count for Resource, Research Evidence or Processed information Sheet(s).

36.name: Additional material  Significant copying
36.details: The candidate has copied extended pieces of text/narrative from the Resource Sheet, Research or Processed Information Sheet(s).

37.name: General Exception A
37.details: Use as detailed in Marking Instructions

38.name: General Exception B
38.details: Use as detailed in Marking Instructions

cookie-panel.message-part-1: RM Assessor{0} uses cookies to deliver an efficient and reliable marking experience for you. Full details of what cookies are and why we use them can be found by reading our
cookie-panel.message-part-2: page. Please note that by continuing to use this site you are consenting to the use of cookies.
cookie-panel.message-part-2-cookies-disabled: page. We have detected that cookies are currently disabled in your browser - this will prevent you from logging in. Please adjust your browser settings to enable cookies before you try to log in.
cookie-panel.dont-show-again: Don't show me this message again
cookie-panel.cookies-link-tooltip: View information about the cookies RM Assessor{0} uses

cookie-detail-page.cookie-page-cookie-purpose: Determines whether the user has chosen to permanently hide the cookie notification panel.
cookie-detail-page.cookies-on-this-site-part-1: In order for this site to work properly your computer needs to accept a number of cookies; without them some fundamental parts of the website won't work as intended.
cookie-detail-page.cookies-on-this-site-part-2: The cookies used on this site include:
cookie-detail-page.what-are-cookies-part-1: Cookies are small text files which are sent to and then stored on your computer when you visit different web pages. We do not store detailed personal information in our cookies, but we use information gathered from cookies to help make your experience on the site better, e.g. by making navigation within the site easier or remembering your preferences. Please note that cookies can't harm your computer or your files.
cookie-detail-page.what-are-cookies-part-2: Cookies are either "session cookies", which are only stored for the duration of your visit to the site and deleted when you close your browser, or "persistent cookies", which are stored for a period of time and activated when you return to the site. In general, session cookies are often used for authentication, and persistent cookies are often used to save your preferences.
cookie-detail-page.session-id-cookie-purpose: Used for denying multiple user logins from different instance of the same browser.

forgot-password-dialog.body: This will open a new browser window or tab. Do you want to continue?

response-data.amd-tooltip: The total difference between the marks awarded and the definitive marks set by the senior examiner team, calculated across each individual question item
response-data.tmd-tooltip: The difference between the overall total mark awarded, and the overall total mark set by the senior examiner team
response-data.exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.blocking-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked exceptions. The marker will not be able to submit the response until these exceptions have been resolved and closed. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.zoning-exceptions-icon-tooltip: The zoning of this candidate's script is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. The marker will not be able to submit this response until this exception is resolved.
response-data.resolved-exceptions-icon-tooltip: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting to be closed. None of these will prevent the response being submitted when marking is complete. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.resolved-and-blocking-exceptions-icon-to: This response has {0} exceptions that are resolved and waiting to be closed. The marker will not be able to submit the response until they have closed these exceptions. Click this icon to view the exceptions.
response-data.messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more linked messages.
response-data.unread-messages-icon-tooltip: This response has one or more unread linked messages.
response-data.mark-change-reason-not-specified-icon-to: No reason for marks change has been entered.

supervisor-remark-mark-later-confirmatio.body: Re-mark request successfully created. The response is now available for marking in your Supervisor re-mark worklist.

supervisor-remark-panel.supervisor-remark-already-raised: Please note, a supervisor re-mark has already been raised for this response, either by you or another senior examiner.

wholeresponse-remark-confirmation-popup.content: The response you have requested to re-mark contains multiple mark groups. The re-mark raised for this response will also have to be marked as a whole response. Are you sure you want to continue raising this re-mark request?

sampling-error-dialog-already-sampled.body: This response has been sampled by another supervisor. Please select OK and then re-open the response to view the updated sampling status.

sampling-error-dialog-withdrawn.body: You have been withdrawn from this question group. This will not prevent you from accessing other question groups where you have a quota.

sampling-error-dialog-subordinate-withdr.body: This examiner has been withdrawn from this question group and this is no longer an available action.

sampling-error-dialog-hierarchy-changed.body: Your role has changed and you are no longer allowed to perform this action.

promote-to-reuse-bucket-not-latest-marks.body: The response you have selected is not the latest set of marks awarded for this candidate and therefore cannot be promoted to the re-use bucket

create-exception-withdrawn-response-dial.body: The response related to this exception has been removed from your worklist due to Quality Control checks, and therefore this exception will not be submitted.  On clicking OK the open response will also close and will no longer be visible in your worklist.

withdrawn-response-dialog.body: This action could not be completed due to a change that has been made to this response by an administrator. The application data will now refresh. Try logging out and back in if the problem persists.

promote-to-seed-dialog.body-own-response: Promoting this response to a seed will remove it from your marking worklist and it will be available in Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-stm-subordinate-response: Promoting this response to a seed will remove it from the current examiner's worklist and it will be available in Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-non-stm-subordinate-response: By promoting this response to a seed it will remain in the current examiner's worklist and it will also be available in Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-not-fully-marked: This response must be 100%% marked before it can be promoted to a seed.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-remarks-exist: The following re-marks exist for this response:
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-remarks-exist-confirmation: Promoting this responses to a seed will remove it from your marking worklist and it will be available in the Standardisation Setup.
promote-to-seed-dialog.body-dynamic-sampling: By promoting this response to a seed it will remain in your marking worklist and it will also be available in Standardisation Setup.

promote-to-seed-no-seeding-dialog.body: The response cannot be promoted to seed as examiners have not been assigned a seeding rate or seeding frequency and the Standardisation seed target is set as zero.

mandatory-message-dialog.body: You have received one or more mandatory messages. Please click OK to view the message(s).

1.subject: Auto Approval
1.content: Following successful standardisation, you have been auto approved for QIG {0} and can start live marking. You may receive additional feedback from your reviewer at a later date.

2.subject: Examiner Auto Approved
2.content: Following successful standardisation on QIG {0}, I have been auto approved.

4.subject: Conditional Auto Approval
4.content: Following successful standardisation, you have been conditionally auto approved for QIG {0}. You may now start live marking up to the conditional approval limit set by your reviewer. You will be fully approved at a later date by your reviewer.

5.subject: Examiner Conditionally Approved
5.content: Following successful standardisation, I have been conditionally approved for QIG {0}. I can mark live scripts up to the conditional approval limit but require you to fully approve me.

7.subject: Auto Suspension
7.content: You have been suspended from marking QIG {0} due to submitting inaccurate responses. You may receive additional feedback from your reviewer at a later date.

8.subject: Examiner Auto Suspended
8.content: I have been suspended from marking due to submitting inaccurate responses on QIG {0}.

10.subject: Please check my marking
10.content: I have given you access to view my Live marking worklist for {0}. Please review my marking and if you agree I have marked my responses correctly please indicate you have checked my work. If you have any comments or concerns about my marking please discuss this with me.

11.subject: Marks Checked
11.content: I have checked your marks for '{0}'.

12.subject: Review Re-mark Completed
12.content: I have completed all the Review Re-marks requested.

13.subject: Refresh Marking Targets
13.content: Your marking target(s) for '{0}' have been updated. The following targets are affected:{1}

14.subject: Grace period updated
14.content: Please note that the grace period of {0} has been changed to {2} hours. This means that any scripts submitted before the time of this message will stay pending after submission for {1} hours; any submitted after the time of this message will close {2} hours after submission.

16.subject: Zoning under review
16.content: The zoning of candidate response ID {0} in your closed worklist is being reviewed following an exception raised against another response related to the same script. Please be aware that the image zones displayed may be changed as a result of this exception. You will be notified when this has been resolved at which point you should review your submitted response and check that the marks you had awarded are still appropriate. Should you find this not to be the case then please contact your Awarding Body Admin team as soon as possible.

17.subject: Zoning review completed
17.content: The zoning of candidate response ID {0} in your closed worklist has been resolved following an exception raised against another response related to the same script. This may have changed the zones for the response items you have marked.  Please review your submitted response and check that the marks you had awarded are still appropriate. Should you find this not to be the case then please contact your Awarding Body Admin team as soon as possible.

18.subject: Examiner Status Update
18.content: I have updated the approval status of {0} from {1} to {2}

19.subject: Notification of Change for Display ID {0}
19.content-removed: For your information, Display ID {0} has been removed from your worklist due to quality checks.
19.content-replaced: For your information, Display ID {0} has been put back in your worklist following quality checks, thanks for your time.
19.content-permanently-removed: For your information, Display ID {0} has been permanently removed from your worklist following quality checks, sorry for any inconvenience caused.

20.subject: Locked Examiner Withdrawn
20.content: I have been withdrawn from marking on QIG {0}, and therefore no longer need action taken from the Approval Management worklist.

21.subject: RIG Removed
21.content: For your information Display ID {0} has been removed from your worklist for QIG {1}.

22.subject: Notification of Change to Marking Instructions document
22.content: A new version of the Marking Instructions for {0} has been made available. Please ensure you access and use this version instead of the previous one.

23.subject: Response removed from worklist for {0}
23.content: Please be Informed that one or more responses have been de-allocated from your worklist for the component-{0}

24.subject: RIG {0} is de-allocated
24.content: The RIG {0} has been de-allocated from your worklist due to quality checks.

25.subject: Notification of new Marking Instructions document
25.content: A new Marking Instructions file for {0} has been made available. Please ensure you view this by clicking the Marking instruction icon in your worklist.

26.subject: Notification for re-mark removal
26.content: This is to inform you that Display ID {0} has been removed from your re-mark work list for question item {1}.

27.subject: Notification of response moved from worklist
27.content: The Response - {0} in your {1} worklist with open exception(s) of '{2}' has been taken by your team leader {3} and moved to the {1} worklist of {3} for further marking. You can no longer access this response in your {1} worklist for viewing or marking.

right-panel.blue-banner-text: Please select a session and then view the scripts on the table below. You can choose to filter by grade and/or mark if required. You can apply your judgements by opening the response.

right-container.select-response-bluebanner-message: Click on any centre to view the available responses for that centre. For the selected centre, click on any response to open it, browse through scripts and choose what you want to mark as provisional definitives.
right-container.provisional-bluebanner-message: These marks are provisional and only visible to you at this time. You must complete marking and share a response to make it visible to the rest of the standardisation team.
right-container.empty-responses-provisional-bluebanner-m: You have no provisional responses to display. To select responses to provisionally mark, select the "Select Responses" menu item.
right-container.classified-bluebanner-message: You can continue to edit marks and annotations for these responses right up until you have clicked the final complete setup button. To re-classify a response then select and drag it up or down the table. You can also set the order that practice and standardisation responses will be allocated to examiners by moving them up and down the list. Seeds are always allocated in a random order.
right-container.empty-responses-classified-bluebanner-me: There are no classified responses to display.
right-container.unclassified-bluebanner-message: These marks can be viewed by everyone in the standardisation team. A response cannot be classified until it has been opened and the marks have been made definitive.
right-container.unclassified-bluebanner-message-for-este: These marks can be viewed by everyone in the standardisation team. A response cannot be classified until it has been opened and the marks have been made definitive. Once these responses are definitively marked and classified they will move to the Classified list, and may disappear if you do not have permission to view the type of response that they have been classified.
right-container.empty-responses-unclassified-bluebanner-: You have no shared provisional responses to display.
right-container.empty-responses-unclassified-without-rol: You have no provisional responses to display.
right-container.select-response-previouse-session-empty-: There are no responses from previous sessions available.
right-container.select-response-previouse-session-defaul: All the responses available in the re-use bucket for this session will be listed in this page. You will be able to perform operations such as viewing the re-usable response, hiding the response from the list and re-using the response in the current session.

select-response.select-to-mark-blue-banner: When you have found a response that you would like to mark as a possible definitive mark, click this button.
select-response.select-to-mark-popup-content-line1: This response will be added to your marking list to be marked.
select-response.select-to-mark-popup-content-line1-provi: This response will be added to your Provisional list to be marked.
select-response.select-to-mark-popup-content-line3: Would you like to start marking now?
select-response.select-to-mark-multiqig-popup-content-li: This response will be split into QIGs for provisional marking. Please indicate below which QIGs you would like to provisionally mark. You will need to open and mark each QIG separately. QIGs where provisional or live marking has already begun for this script will not be available for selection.
select-response.select-to-mark-popup-option-allocate-all: Allocate this provisional response to all standardisation team members
select-response.select-to-mark-popup-option-allocate-me: Allocate this provisional response to me only, for use as an STM Standardisation response

mark-as-definitive.mark-as-definitive-blue-banner: Click this button if you want to use this response for definitive marking. You will then be able to edit the marks and annotations. You will only be able to classify the marks after you have made them definitive.
mark-as-definitive.mark-as-definitive-popup-content-line3: When the response is definitive you will be able to edit the marks and annotations and classify the response.
mark-as-definitive.mark-as-definitive-popup-content-line4: When the response is definitive you will be able to edit the marks and annotations and classify the response.
mark-as-definitive.mark-as-definitive-popup-radio-1: Copy marks and annotations as definitive
mark-as-definitive.mark-as-definitive-popup-radio-1-desc: You will be able to edit before classifying.
mark-as-definitive.mark-as-definitive-popup-radio-2-desc: The shared marks and annotations will be deleted and you will have to enter them again for all items. This action cannot be undone.

left-panel.complete-standardisation-validate-body: Standardisation Setup could not be completed as not all required targets were found to have been met. On clicking OK the progress against targets will be refreshed to show the latest information.
left-panel.complete-standardisation-popup-body: Are you sure you want to complete standardisation setup? When this is done, examiners will be able to start marking.
left-panel.complete-setup-helper-message-when-targe: Targets which have an icon that is not ticked must be met before you can complete standardisation setup. Targets with no icon next to the target do not have to be met.

Targets which have an icon that is not ticked must be met before you can complete standardisation setup. The following targets must also not be exceeded in order for you to complete standardisation setup:{0}.Targets with no icon next to the target do not have to be met.
left-panel.note-timestamp-changed-popup-body: Your changes to the notes could not be saved because another examiner has also made a change. The latest notes will now be reloaded.
left-panel.note-response-modified-popup-body: Your changes to the notes could not be saved because another examiner has made changes to this response. You will now be returned to the worklist.

discard-response-popup.provisional-body: Clicking this will remove the response from your provisional worklist. All existing marks and annotations will be lost.
discard-response-popup.unclassified-body: Clicking this will remove the response from the unclassified worklist. All existing marks and annotations will be lost.
discard-response-popup.classified-body: Clicking this will remove the response from the classified worklist. All existing marks and annotations will be lost.
discard-response-popup.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to continue?

response-already-discarded-popup.body-with-response-id: Changes that you have made against the response {0} could not be saved, as it has already been discarded by someone else. Please click OK to navigate back to worklist to view the latest changes.

declassify-popup.body: Declassifying this response will move it from the classified list back to the unclassified list. All definitive marking will be retained.
declassify-popup.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to continue?

reclassify-popup.body: The selected response will be moved from {0} to {1}. Are you sure you want to continue?
reclassify-popup.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to continue?

reclassifyerror-popup.body: It was not possible to move response {0} from {1} to {2}.

reordererror-popup.body: It was not possible to re-order the response {0}. Please try again.

reclassify-multioption-popup.body: This will move the response directly to the classified worklist. Select the response classification from the options below. Types marked as restricted will only be visible to selected users.
reclassify-multioption-popup.body-complete-setup-message: You will still be able to change the marks and classification until you press the Complete setup button.

classify-multioption-popup.body-complete-setup-message: Since standardisation setup has already been completed, you will not be able to change the marks or classification after you click OK.

share-response-popup.body: After sharing this response it will move to the unclassified list. These marks and annotations will be visible to all of the standardisation team ready to be reviewed and made definitive.
share-response-popup.confirmation-text: Would you like to share this response now?
share-response-popup.share-note: This will move the response to the unclassified list where marks and annotations will be visible to all of the standardisation team before being reviewed and made definitive.
share-response-popup.annotation-note: This will make your marks and annotations definitive and move the response directly to the classified worklist. Select the response classification from the options below. Types marked as Restricted will only be visible to selected users.
share-response-popup.share-mark: Share marks for review before classifying

concurrent-esmarkingmode-save-fail-popup.body: Changes that you have made against this response could not be saved as someone else has made some edits in the background. Please click OK to navigate back to worklist to view the latest changes.
concurrent-esmarkingmode-save-fail-popup.body-with-response-id: Changes that you have made against the response {0} could not be saved as some one else has made some edits in the background. Please click OK to navigate back to worklist to view the latest changes.

reuse-action-popup.reuse-content: If you re-use this response, RM Assessor will create a copy of the selected response in the current session.
reuse-action-popup.reuse-unclassify-option: Create copy and move to unclassified list

withdrawn-script-dialog.body: This response is a seed which was withdrawn and it cannot now be viewed

standardisation-setup-additional-page-po.content: This candidate's response contains additional pages that are not part of the main answer booklet

standardisation-script-unavailable-popup.content: It was not possible to create provisionals in the following QIG(s): {0} as someone else has made some edits in the background. Please click OK to navigate back to worklist to view the latest changes.

unclassified-script-unavailable-popup.content: Response {0} has now been removed from the Unclassified worklist and the changes cannot be saved.

shared-response-indicator-tooltip.content: This script has been assigned to all members of the standardisation team for provisional marking.

support-login-page.content: As an administrator, you can choose to login to the live environment (for admin re-marking or awarding) or login to the support environment as an examiner to assist with a support query.
support-login-page.content-switch-user: Select an examiner below to log into the support environment as them, to assist them with a support query.
support-login-page.radio-button-text-live: Login to the live environment as myself
support-login-page.radio-button-text-support: Login to the support environment as a selected examiner

search-response.search-placeholder: Search for a response by ID
search-response.search-tooltip: Enter a Response ID here to search for responses
search-response.search-rig-not-found-content: The response that you are searching for could not be found in the selected question group.
